name: Ana
description: Co-Captain of Overwatch who wields a bolt action rifle, capable of healing teammates and damaging enemies
ultimate: NANO BOOST: For 10 Seconds, Increase dealt and reduce damaged received by 50%

name: Ashe
description: As the leader of the Deadlock Gang, this western cultured girl wields a Semi Automatic rifle capable of short and long range damage
ultimate: B.O.B: Deploy a robotic sidekick that does massive hitscan damage

name: Bastion
description: A dual configurable tank like robot that specializes in mobile Run and Gun or immobile minigun assult
ultimate: CONFIGURATION: TANK: Transform into a deadly projectile firing tank dealing massive amounts of AOE damage

name: Brigitte
description: German brunette who wields a Rocket Flail causing AOE damage, and low HP shield for protection and stuns. Heals passively through damage dealing and actively through armor packs
ultimate: RALLY: Increase ally speed by 30% whilst providing 15 armor per second up to 100 extra HP

name: D.VA
description: The youngest Hero to serve Overwatch. Serves the MEKKA association whilst living a secondary life in the realm of gaming. D.VA pilots a 'Mech' that wields 2 machine guns
ultimate: SELF DESTRUCT: Deliberately self destruct your Mech, effectively turning it into a massive AOE nuke

name: Doomfist
description: Part of Overwatch enemy group Talon, this super buff african-american wields a rocket propelled fist, capable of instant death
ultimate: METEOR STRIKE: Rocket into the air and choose a strike position, dealing massive AOE on impact

name: Genji
description: A Cyborg Ninja who wields shurikens, deflection blade, and dragon blade
ultimate: DRAGON BLADE: Draw a shimada posessed katana, dealing massive AOE damage per strike

name: McCree
ultimate: DEADEYE: Lock on to a max of 6 targets, eliminating them instantly

name: Hanzo
description: Wields a shimada posessed bow, capable of burst fire and long range attack
ultimate: DRAGONSTRIKE: Shoot an arrow which transforms into two dragons, dealing massive AOE damage on enemy contact

name: Junkrat
description: Reckless Australian maniac who wields a homemade grenade launcher, landmines, bear trap, and explosive controllable tire
ultimate: RIPTIRE: Deploy a remote controlled explosive spiked tire. Maneuver and remotely detonate at will dealing massive AOE damage
